title: How does one farm blue essence
body: Legit levels give such BE, that I was wondering league might as well turn itself into a Pay to play game for any new player. Or should I give up on this stuff?

replies.body: It works exactly the same as the old system, except champions are overall cheaper and you get it in lumps instead of steadily.
I have to play so many games just to earn 90-960 BE I'd rather the game not give me a 450 which happens often. TBH playing for levels is kinda disheartening. I kinda liked exploring new champions.
